Your son, a youth of excellent disposition, courteously took leave of me upon his quitting this country. I pray God that he may return to you in safety, and that as an aged parent you may have the enjoyment of a pious son. Fare- well, From the Isle of Ely in England. July 12, 1574.

Your most loving brother in Christ,

RICHARD UOX.
